summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SMAN 2 Pangkalan Bun school website sub-pages and features. All profile sub-pages, news detail pages, service pages, and navigation functionality working perfectly. Multi-language support, responsive design, and image loading all functional.
passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with navigation and hero section
Profile sub-pages: Principal's message (/profil/sambutan-kepala-sekolah) with hero and content sections
History page (/profil/sejarah) with timeline showing 8 milestones and stats
Vision & Mission page (/profil/visi-misi) with vision card, 8 mission items, and motto
Facilities page (/profil/sarana-prasarana) with facility statistics and cards
Adiwiyata program page (/profil/adiwiyata) with environmental programs
Teaching staff page (/profil/tenaga-pendidik) loads correctly
Organizational structure page (/profil/struktur-organisasi) loads correctly
News list page (/berita) loads correctly
News article detail page (/berita/sman-2-pangkalan-bun-raih-juara-osn-tingkat-provinsi) with hero, content, and related articles sidebar
Gallery page (/berita/galeri) loads correctly
Agenda page (/berita/agenda) loads correctly
Services overview page (/layanan) loads correctly
Extracurricular page (/layanan/ekstrakurikuler) loads correctly
Laboratory page (/layanan/laboratorium) with lab cards and facility images
Library page (/layanan/perpustakaan) loads correctly
Achievements page (/prestasi) loads correctly
Alumni page (/alumni) loads correctly
Finance page (/keuangan) loads correctly
Contact page (/kontak) with functional form (name, email, message, submit button)
Language switcher (ID/EN) working correctly
Navigation dropdowns working for Profile, News, Services menus
Breadcrumb navigation working correctly
Back buttons on sub-pages working (back-to-profile, back-to-news, back-to-services)
External images loading correctly (6 images found on laboratory page)
Responsive design with mobile menu button
All data-testid attributes present for robust testing
